title: 이달의소녀탐구 #457 (LOONA TV #457)
summary:
It's the last day of LOOΠΔ Studio.
0:06 -- HaSeul mentions the same and claps. All the members enter the waiting room one by one.
0:15 -- HeeJin: "The first day was amazing and I was really happy~"
0:20 -- Olivia mentions that she feels worried as the unit that performed before them added a twist to their performance.
0:31 -- Memeable Chuu Smile. Go Won's silent 'Hwaiting~'.
0:39 -- The 12 are on stage with HaSeul who is singing 'The Carol'. It is just a rehearsal.
